taxon_identification.name_authority_date: Andropogon gyrans var. stenophyllus (Hack.) C.S. Campb.

bio:treatment.description: Ligules (0.8)1.1-1.5 mm. Inflorescence units usually with 2 rames; rames usually exposed at maturity.
bio:treatment.discussion: Andropogon gyrans var. stenophyllus grows in ditches, bogs, savannahs, and pond margins of the coastal plain, from eastern Texas to North Carolina.
